briefTitle: Trial of 2nd Generation Anti-CEA Designer T Cells in Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase Ia/Ib Trial of 2nd Generation Anti-CEA Designer T Cells in Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Phase Ia:Determine the safety of using modified T-cells by documenting the type and severity of any side effects and establishing the maximum tolerated dose (MTD).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Must have cancer of the breast
* Must have metastatic or unresectable locally advanced disease
* Tumor must express CEA by tumor staining or by elevated serum CEA (\>10 ng/ml)
* Must have measurable disease radiologically or by physical exam
* Must have failed potentially curative standard therapy
* Must be 18 years of age or older
* Good performance status (PS 0-1)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Requiring systemic steroids
* Serious medical conditions
* Concurrent malignancies
